name: Santa's Colisseum
description:
You've been a bad, bad SnowWoman that's made their way onto only the naughtiest of Santa's Naughty List!

Your only way out is to become the very best in Santa's Colisseum.

Survive for as long as you can and maybe, just maybe you won't get coal next year.

  • (WASD) - Movement
  • (Left Click) - Throw Snowball
  • Avoid the fire and the candy if you melt too much, it's GAME OVER!
  • You regenerate and build your snowball by moving around
  • Earn bonus points by defeating multiple enemies!
  • You can bounce the snowball off the wall for extra points!
  • Defeating enemies from afar doubles your points!
  • Over time you Level Up! which increases the size of your snowballs and your regeneration speed!

This project is a submission to the ACM Winter Games Jam!

Programmer: Stani_Slav

Artist: 4ng13, Mad_Ladd

Sound Designer: rexland

Game Designer(s): ShakirE

If you experience any lag, try running the game in windowed mode (by pressing alt+enter)
